original_text: You have not helped the weak sheep to be strong. You have not made the sick sheep well. Nor have you covered their wounds. You have not looked for lost sheep and brought them back. Instead, you have ruled my people in a cruel way.
korean_text: 너희가 그 연약한 자를 강하게 아니하며 병든 자를 고치지 아니하며 상한 자를 싸매 주지 아니하며 쫓기는 자를 돌아오게 하지 아니하며 잃어버린 자를 찾지 아니하고 다만 포악으로 그것들을 다스렸도다

sentences.original_text: You have not helped the weak sheep
You have not made the sick sheep well
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 병든 양들을 낫게 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: Nor have you covered their wounds
You have not looked for lost sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 길 잃은 양들을 찾아보지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, you have ruled my people
